name: Sukiyaki
description: Sukiyaki uses AI to search and filter all routes available for a given swap to return the best rates to users 65% of the time! Sukiyaki doesn't charge any fees on swaps, except the standard 0.3% fee from DEXs we aggregate. Sukiyaki’s ambition most importantly, is to return best rates to users at 94% of the time compared to other dex through the use of her custom built AI that route for best prices on chain and cross chain” and ultimately earning the taglines of being the Most Efficient Dex in the market. And also adding the following spices; Positive slippage, Auto slippage etc along the way.
